messages.subject: car seats
messages.msgSnippet: i take my kids out and put them on my lap occasionally too...glad to know ... I do this also....AFTER I ve stopped the car and taken my child out of his car
messages.messageBody:
"i take my kids out and put them on my lap occasionally too...glad to
know
> i'm not alone"
> audrey
>


I do this also....AFTER I've stopped the car and taken my child out
of his car seat.
I can not for the life of me understand why anyone that is interested
in the safety of children can not see what an extremely dangerous
practice this would be while a car is in motion.
Been in too many wrecks and close calls to not have deep respect for
how quickly life can change due to a bad/inattentive driver.
Dh wouldn't be here if it weren't for seat belts. Almost didn't make
it anyway. Children without belts/car seats are like projectiles,
they are the most vulnerable.
Keep them safe, please....they have no choice in the matter.
Ren
